## Events.Abstract.run() method

Run an event.

**Signature:**

```typescript
run(_forward: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  \_forward | boolean | True if run forward, false if run backward (undo). |

**Returns:**

void
